string.name: challengesX
string.comment: %1$s is the number of challenges. Appears as hover text for challenge notifications.

resources.string: Desafíos: %1$s
Desafiar a una partida
Desafío refusau
Desafío acceptau!
Desafío cancelau.
Has d\'estar rechistrau pa ninviar desafíos.
No puez desafiar a %s.
%s no accepta desafíos.
La tuya puntuación de %1$s ye masiau aleixada de %2$s.
No puez ninviar desafíos perque la tuya puntuación de %s ye provisional.
%s nomás accepta desafíos d\'os suyos amigos.
No accepto desafíos en este momento.

string.name: declineLater
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: No me viene bien agora, torna-me-lo a demandar mas enta debant.

string.name: declineTooFast
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: Este control de tiempos ye masiau rapido pa yo, per favor, desafía-me a una partida mas lenta.

string.name: declineTooSlow
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: Este control de tiempos ye masiau lento pa yo, per favor, desafiame a una partida mas rapida.

string.name: declineTimeControl
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: No accepto desafíos con este control de tiempos.

string.name: declineRated
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: Per favor, desafía-me a una partida puntuable.

string.name: declineCasual
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: Per favor, desafía-me a una partida amistosa.

string.name: declineStandard
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: No accepto desafía chugar variants en este momento.

string.name: declineVariant
string.comment: One of the standard replies which players can use to decline challenges.

resources.string: No quiero chugar esta variant en este momento.
No accepto desafíos de bots.
Nomás accepto desafíos de bots.

string.name: inviteLichessUser
string.comment: Appears when using the 'play with a friend' button. This option lets you create a challenge on Lichess. The alternative is to send the player a URL.

resources.string: U convida a un usuario de Lichess:
